verses.verse: Then Eliphaz<WH464> the Temanite<WH8489> responded,<WH6030> <WH559>
"Can a vigorous man<WH1397> be of use<WH5532> to God,<WH410> Or<WH3588> a wise<WH7919> man be useful<WH5532> to himself?
"Is there any pleasure<WH2656> to the Almighty<WH7706> if<WH3588> you are righteous,<WH6663> Or<WH518> profit<WH1215> if<WH3588> you make<WH8552> your ways<WH1870> perfect<WH8552>?
"Is it because<WH4480> of your reverence<WH3374> that He reproves<WH3198> you, That He enters<WH935> into judgment<WH4941> against<WH5973> you?
"Is not your wickedness<WH9567> great,<WH7227> And your iniquities<WH5771> without<WH369> end<WH7093>?
"For you have taken<WH9111> pledges<WH9111> of your brothers<WH251> without<WH2600> cause,<WH2600> And stripped<WH6584> men naked.<WH6174>
"To the weary<WH5889> you have given<WH8248> no<WH3808> water<WH4325> to drink,<WH8248> And from the hungry<WH7457> you have withheld<WH4513> bread.<WH3899>
"But the earth<WH776> belongs to the mighty<WH2220> man,<WH376> And the honorable<WH5375> <WH6440> man dwells<WH3427> in it.
"You have sent<WH7971> widows<WH490> away<WH7971> empty,<WH7387> And the strength<WH2220> of the orphans<WH3490> has been crushed.<WH1792>
"Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> snares<WH6341> surround<WH5439> you, And sudden<WH6597> dread<WH6343> terrifies<WH926> you,
Or<WH176> darkness,<WH2822> so that you cannot<WH3808> see,<WH7200> And an abundance<WH8229> of water<WH4325> covers<WH3680> you.
"Is not God<WH433> [in] the height<WH1363> of heaven<WH8064>? Look<WH7200> also at the distant<WH7218> stars,<WH3556> how<WH3588> high<WH7311> they are!
"And you say,<WH559> 'What<WH4100> does God<WH410> know<WH3045>? Can He judge<WH8199> through<WH1157> the thick<WH6205> darkness<WH6205>?
'Clouds<WH5645> are a hiding<WH5643> place<WH5643> for Him, so that He cannot<WH3808> see;<WH7200> And He walks<WH1980> on the vault<WH2329> of heaven.<WH8064>'
"Will you keep<WH8104> to the ancient<WH5769> path<WH734> Which<WH834> wicked<WH205> men<WH4962> have trod,<WH1869>
Who<WH834> were snatched<WH7059> away<WH7059> before their time,<WH6256> Whose foundations<WH3247> were washed<WH3332> away<WH3332> by a river<WH5104>?
"They said<WH559> to God,<WH410> 'Depart<WH5493> from us!' And 'What<WH4100> can the Almighty<WH7706> do<WH6466> to them?'
"Yet He filled<WH4390> their houses<WH1004> with good<WH9185> [things;] But the counsel<WH6098> of the wicked<WH7563> is far<WH7368> from me.
"The righteous<WH6662> see<WH7200> and are glad,<WH8055> And the innocent<WH9345> mock<WH3932> them,
[Saying,] 'Truly<WH518> <WH3808> our adversaries<WH7009> are cut<WH3582> off,<WH3582> And their abundance<WH3499> the fire<WH784> has consumed.<WH398>'
"Yield<WH5532> now<WH4994> and be at peace<WH7999> with Him; Thereby good<WH9186> will come<WH935> to you.
"Please<WH4994> receive<WH3947> instruction<WH8451> from His mouth,<WH6310> And establish<WH7760> His words<WH561> in your heart.<WH3824>
"If<WH518> you return<WH7725> to the Almighty,<WH7706> you will be restored;<WH1129> If you remove<WH7368> unrighteousness<WH9390> far<WH7368> from your tent,<WH168>
And place<WH7896> [your] gold<WH1220> in the dust,<WH6083> And [the gold of] Ophir<WH211> among the stones<WH6697> of the brooks,<WH5158>
Then the Almighty<WH7706> will be your gold<WH1220> And choice<WH8443> silver<WH3701> to you.
"For then<WH227> you will delight<WH6026> in the Almighty,<WH7706> And lift<WH5375> up your face<WH6440> to God.<WH433>
"You will pray<WH6279> to Him, and He will hear<WH8085> you; And you will pay<WH9608> your vows.<WH5088>
"You will also decree<WH1504> a thing,<WH561> and it will be established<WH6965> for you; And light<WH216> will shine<WH5050> on your ways.<WH1870>
"When<WH3588> you are cast<WH8213> down,<WH8213> you will speak<WH559> with confidence<WH1466> And the humble<WH7807> <WH5869> person<WH7807> <WH5869> He will save.<WH3467>
"He will deliver<WH4422> one who is not innocent,<WH9345> And he will be delivered<WH4422> through the cleanness<WH1252> of your hands.<WH3709>"
